body_html:
@qimw Do you have a /usr/local/cuda that is a symlink to either /usr/local/cuda-8.0 or /usr/local/cuda-9.0 or something similar?
What is env | grep CUDA
What is nvcc --version and nvidia-smi
Did you pass these flags " --install-locally --cuda 9.0 --cudnn 7" or your version equivalents to the scripts/build_anaconda.sh command?
Can you post your cmake output?
body_text:
@qimw Do you have a /usr/local/cuda that is a symlink to either /usr/local/cuda-8.0 or /usr/local/cuda-9.0 or something similar?

body:
@qimw Do you have a /usr/local/cuda that is a symlink to either /usr/local/cuda-8.0 or /usr/local/cuda-9.0 or something similar?
What is env | grep CUDA
What is nvcc --version and nvidia-smi
Did you pass these flags " --install-locally --cuda 9.0 --cudnn 7" or your version equivalents to the scripts/build_anaconda.sh command?
Can you post your cmake output?
